word: G790 - ἀστατέω - astatéō - as-tat-eh'-o - Have no certain dwelling-place

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Have no certain dwelling-place
to wander about, to rove without a settled abode
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G1 (as a negative particle) and a derivative of G2476; to be non stationary, that is, (figuratively) homeless: - have no certain dwelling-place.
